src_original: śakti-bheda iti cet /  03623 sarvatra utsannam idānīṃ eka-vacanam eka-śakter abhāvāt / yatnaś
tgt_original: tadā kintatra bāhulyaṃ yenaivaṃ bhavati śaktibheda iti cet |  sarvvatrocchinnamidānīmekavacanamekaśakterabhāvāt |

src_original: 03624 ca vyarthaḥ /  vastv-abhedād anyatra eka-vacanam iti cet /
tad ayaṃ nirvastuko niyamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ svātantryam  03626 icchāyāḥ śabda-prayoge khyāpayati /
tgt_original: tadayannirvastuko niyamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ svātantryamicchāyāḥ śabdaprayoge khyāpayati |

src_original: ṣaṇṇagarī iti ca  03627 kathaṃ bahuṣv eka-vacanam /
tgt_original: etena tadapi pratyuktaṃ yadāha kumārilaḥ ( |)  vyakteravayavānāmvā saṃkhyāmādāya vartata iti || (28)  ṣaṇṇagarīti ca kathamvahuṣvekavacanaṃ |

src_original: na hi nagarāṇy eva kiṃcit /  03701 kutas teṣām samāhāraḥ /

tgt_original: prāsādapuruṣādīnāṃ vijātīyānāmanārambhāt kutastatsamudāyo dravyaṃ asaṃyogācca nāpi saṃyogaḥ |
